Global Procedures & Results
본 EGA는 해당 FSLI에 가장 일반적으로 적용되는 실증 절차들을 포함하고 있음.
사업프로세스에 대한 감사인의 이해와 평가된 중요왜곡표시위험에 따라 필요한 경우, 하단 버튼을 선택하여 테스트를 추가함.
This EGA includes the most commonly applicable substantive procedures for this FSLI.
Select the button(s) below for additional testing, based on our understanding of the business process and assessed risks of material misstatement.




필요한 경우, EGA fly-in pane에서 추가 EGA를 활용할 수 있음. 
If necessary additional EGAs are also available from the EGA fly-in pane.

총괄표 및 subledger와의 대사 - (C, A, CO, E/O, R&O, P&D)

탭 'Reconciliation & Confirms'에서 은행계정조정표와 은행 거래 명세서를 입수함. 잔액과 조정항목들을 근거 문서와 대사함.
Obtained bank reconciliations and bank statements in tab 'Reconciliation & Confirms'. Agreed balances and reconciling items to supporting documentation.

Tested bank account balances at period end (based on strategy determined in the Planning EGA covering our audit strategy and plan).

Note - Examples of indications that the response may not be reliable include the following:
- Confirmation was not received directly by the auditor
- Confirmation appears not to come from the originally intended confirming party
- Electronic documents are not in an unalterable PDF format
- Source email address or facsimile details inconsistent with expectations
- Confirmation is hand delivered to the auditor
